@dev 把GOT抵押到Boardroom
 @param amount 质押数量

documentation.text:
@dev 从Boardroom赎回GOT
 @param amount 赎回数量

@title GoSwap Cash Boardroom合约
 实现功能：
 1.GOT抵押到Boardroom，从Boardroom赎回GOT
 2.每次Epoch时，Admin计算GOC增发的数量(计算公式在Treasury合约)，
 并把GOC奖励分配给把GOT抵押到Boardroom的董事
 注解：TimBear 20210107
@dev GoSwap Cash合约地址
@dev 映射：每个地址对应每个董事会席位，即一个地址对应一个董事(结构体)
@dev 董事会快照数组

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Boardroom.BoardSnapshot storage ref[] storage ref
literal_string "Boardroom: The director does not exist"

arguments.value: Boardroom: The director does not exist

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Boardroom: The director does not exist"

documentation.text: @notice 修饰符：需要调用者在Boardroom的抵押数量大于0

@notice 修饰符：更新指定用户的奖励(GOC)
 @param director 成员地址

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Boardroom.BoardSnapshot storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev 最后快照索引
 @return 索引值

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Boardroom.BoardSnapshot storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev 董事会最后一次快照具体内容
 @return 董事会快照结构体

@dev 从Boardroom赎回GOT，并提取奖励

@dev 从Boardroom收获奖励，奖励为GOC
 @notice 修改器中先更新了指定用户的奖励(GOC)
